Notes.Text:
This update for apache2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-33193: Fixed request splitting via HTTP/2 method injection and mod_proxy (bsc#1189387).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: A crafted method sent through HTTP/2 will bypass validation and be forwarded by mod_proxy, which can lead to request splitting or cache poisoning. This issue affects Apache HTTP Server 2.4.17 to 2.4.48.
